pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Collection of Oversampling Techniques for Class Imbalance Problem Based on SMOTE // A collection of various oversampling techniques developed from SMOTE is provided. SMOTE is a oversampling technique which synthesizes a new minority instance between a pair of one minority instance and one of its K nearest neighbor. Other techniques adopt this concept with other criteria in order to generate balanced dataset for class imbalance problem.
